subject: Quran Studies

overview.description: Comprehensive Quranic studies curriculum integrating traditional Islamic scholarship with modern scientific understanding, emphasizing Quranic wisdom in contemporary contexts and scientific inquiry

learning_objectives: Master Quranic recitation, memorization, and interpretation principles
Understand Quranic guidance in scientific and technological contexts
Apply Quranic ethics to modern scientific and social challenges
Develop skills in Quranic research and scholarly methodology
Integrate Islamic worldview with contemporary knowledge systems

units.title: Quranic Foundations and Scientific Methodology
learning_outcomes: Understand Quranic principles of knowledge acquisition
Apply Quranic methodology to scientific inquiry
Analyze Quranic verses related to natural phenomena
Develop skills in Quranic exegesis and interpretation

lessons.title: Quran as a Guide to Scientific Inquiry
objectives: Understand Quranic verses encouraging observation and reflection
Apply Quranic principles to scientific methodology
Analyze the relationship between revelation and reason

activities.description: Analyze Quranic verses promoting scientific observation and thinking
Explore how Quranic principles align with scientific methodology
Discuss historical examples of Muslim scientists using Quranic guidance
Synthesize insights about revelation and scientific inquiry

cross_curricular_connections: History: Islamic Golden Age contributions to science

units.title: Quranic Cosmology and Natural Sciences
learning_outcomes: Understand Quranic descriptions of cosmic and natural phenomena
Analyze Quranic verses in light of modern scientific discoveries
Apply Quranic guidance to environmental stewardship
Develop appreciation for Quranic wisdom in natural sciences

lessons.title: Quranic Verses on Creation and Natural Phenomena
objectives: Study Quranic descriptions of cosmic creation and development
Understand Quranic guidance on environmental responsibility
Analyze compatibility between Quranic teachings and scientific discoveries

activities.description: Study Quranic verses describing natural phenomena and creation
Correlate Quranic descriptions with modern scientific understanding
Apply Quranic environmental principles to contemporary issues
Reflect on the wisdom and guidance in Quranic natural descriptions

units.title: Quranic Ethics and Technological Applications
learning_outcomes: Understand Quranic ethical principles in technological contexts
Apply Islamic ethics to modern technological challenges
Analyze Quranic guidance on human-technology relationships
Develop Islamic perspective on artificial intelligence and biotechnology

lessons.title: Islamic Ethics in Biotechnology and Medical Technology
objectives: Understand Quranic principles regarding life and human dignity
Apply Islamic ethics to biotechnology and medical advances
Analyze Islamic perspective on genetic engineering and medical ethics

activities.description: Study Quranic and Sunnah principles regarding life and medical intervention
Analyze contemporary biotechnology cases through Islamic ethical lens
Practice Islamic ethical decision-making in technological scenarios
Discuss application to current technological challenges

resources: Contemporary medical and biotechnology case studies

units.title: Quranic Research Methods and Academic Integration
learning_outcomes: Master traditional and modern Quranic research methodologies
Integrate Quranic scholarship with academic research
Develop skills in comparative religious and scientific studies
Apply Quranic insights to interdisciplinary research

objectives: Conduct independent research integrating Quranic studies with modern disciplines
Apply scholarly methodology to Quranic interpretation
Present research findings in academic format

activities.description: Plan research project integrating Quranic studies with chosen academic field
Conduct research using both traditional Islamic and modern academic methods
Present research in academic conference format

Access to Islamic libraries and archives
